name: CQLMessageCategoryCodes
title: CQL Message Category Codes
description: Codes for categorization of messages returned by applications that process Clinical Quality Language, whether as part of authoring or evaluating.

concept.definition: The message is associated with compile-time (or authoring) processing, such as a lexical, syntactic, or semantic error.
The message is associated with lexical processing, such as an invalid token.
The message is associated with syntactic processing of CQL, such as an unexpected keyword.
The message is associated with semantic processing of CQL, such as an unresolvable function call.
The message is associated with run-time (or evaluation) processing of CQL, such as a duplicate value.
